name: The Pixel Spaceship (Beta)
description:
Hello to everyone !

It's my first published game. If u like this, please donate and download :)

Let me introduce myself

My name is Kuzey.  I'm Turkish. Im 13 years old and i love making games. 

I want to be a game developer

(sorry for my english lol) 
Anyway,

Please write a positive comments. Thank you so much for donate and supported me !

-Kuzey :3

(It's a child ?!?!?!?!?!) yeah.

Hmm. Very simple..(okay click this spaceship and go to my channel XD)
